name: Ring-Out Rumble! Beta V.1.1
description:
Welcome to the year 20XX!

Our civilization knows neither war, nor famine, nor poverty. But people are bored. It was then that Mr. Lee, CEO of Mirai Corp, the multinational that put an end to the evils of humanity, decided to organize the greatest martial tournament in history: the Ring-Out Rumble!
All shots are allowed. All weapons are allowed.

Only one rule: eject your opponent out of the ring!
